messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Book reccomendations?
messages.msgSnippet: I think John Holt got me into the unschooling frame of mind first but I ve read SO MANY great ones since him.  But if I were to suggest a start, it would be
messages.messageBody:
I think John Holt got me into the unschooling frame of mind first but
I've read SO MANY great ones since him. But if I were to suggest a
start, it would be his "Teach Your Own".
Amy in WV

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Book reccomendations?
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: melyndalaurent@mn.rr.com What ONE book would you reccomend to start reading for beginning US? I need to start somewhere. -=-=-=-=- Rue Kream s
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: melyndalaurent@...

What ONE book would you reccomend to start reading for beginning US?
I need to start somewhere.
-=-=-=-=-

Rue Kream's Parenting a Free Child, An Unchooled Life

~Kelly
